title: Delete or lock specific messages in the same session, and delete them in batches
answer:
In the message information screen, hold the text message to be locked, and select Lock to lock the message. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109949) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109950)

 On the conversation screen, hold a conversation, select the conversation you want to delete, and press ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109951) to delete message in batches. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109952) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109953)
